The class template {{tt|atomic_shared_ptr}} provides thread-safe atomic pointer operations over a {{lc|std::shared_ptr}}. It provides a better alternative to [[cpp/memory/shared_ptr/atomic|the non-member {{tt|shared_ptr}} atomic access functions]].
